DescriptionText: The room is filled with so much treasure you don't even know where to start.
InspectionText: There is an open door to the west you can go through.
EnterText: As you walk in, your eyes are blinded by the glistening gold coins overflowing from the many chests in the room
ExitText: As you leave, a tear falls from your eye as you look at what was left behind.
